data.SOURCE:
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Invoice Item'
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_INV_ITM
  provider contract transactional_query
  as projection on ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVOICE_ITEM
{
  key BillingDocument,
  key BillingDocumentItem,
      HigherLevelItem,
      HigherLvlItmOfBatSpltItm,
      Product,
      BillingDocumentItemText,
      BillingQuantity,
      BillingQuantityUnit,
      ItemGrossWeight,
      ItemNetWeight,
      ItemWeightUnit,
      ItemVolume,
      ItemVolumeUnit,
      TransactionCurrency,
      NetAmount,
      TaxAmount,
      Batch,
      Plant,
      PlantName,
      StorageLocation,
      StorageLocationName,
      ShippingPoint,
      ShippingPointName,
      SalesDocument,
      SalesDocumentItem,
      ReferenceSDDocument,
      ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
      ShipToParty,
      OrganizationBPName1
}
